text:
League 1
OM - OL: 61,000 fans at the V√©lodrome?
The shock of the 13th day of L1 between the two Olympics (Marseille and Lyonnais) could exceed 60 000 tickets sold at the Stade V√©lodrome.
04 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Charlie Creteur



Last year, the Marseille had lost to their Olympian rival on the score of 3-0. This weekend, the 13th day of Ligue 1 will end with a clash between Olympique Marseille and Olympique Lyonnais. A meeting whose reception reserved to the former head coach Rudi Garcia now OL coach, will be scrutinized. In the meantime, this match promises a big affluence at the Stade V√©lodrome.




The bar of 60,000 tickets sold crossed?




Rudi Garcia + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

According to information from RMC Sport, 61,000 fans would be expected for this match of the 13th day of Ligue 1, Sunday (21h). A giant tifo celebrating 120 years of the club would also be expected. The atmosphere promises to be at the rendezvous!
